Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On VA-10 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Tucker Rd; Rt. 774E/W (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-207 North in the County of Caroline, in the vicinity of Colonial Rd; Rt. 722N/S (Caroline County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 148 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On US-13 in the County of Accomack, in the vicinity of Withams Rd; Rt. 703E/W (Accomack County), near 7410 Lankford highway, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder and left lane are closed. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
